diff_act: 1.Require confirmation from the driver to proceed with automatic transfer to Shunting
3.Provide indications of speed upon request from the driver
4.Dynamically update supervised Shunting speed based on real-time trackside inputs

regen.absent_element: confirmation needed from the driver for automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: Driver confirmation is required to proceed with automatic transfer to Shunting when under supervised speed conditions.

regen.absent_element: driver confirmation for automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: The system shall require and process confirmation from the driver to proceed with automatic transfer to Shunting operation at speeds equal or lower than the supervised Shunting speed.

regen.absent_element: confirmation process with the driver before automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: Before automatically transferring to Shunting, the system shall require and obtain confirmation from the driver that the transfer can proceed.

label: Before authomatic transition to Shunting, ETCS shall request confirmation from the driver.
absence: confirmation from the driver if authomatic transition to Shunting
